document_data.name: Weet Greenspen
document_data.mainbody: '''Weet Greenspen''' was an alchemist in the [[Moonsea]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].{{Cite adventurers league/No Foolish Matter|16}}
document_data.History: ''Circa'' [[1486 DR]], the [[doppelganger]] [[Tak]], posing as Doctor [[Jubal]] of the wandering [[Doctor Jubal's Carnival of Curiosities]], kidnapped Weet and forced her to brew alchemical items.{{Cite adventurers league/No Foolish Matter|14}}
